ygData.subject: New guild member
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, all. I just joined MA on Rodcet yesterday (as Snapdragyn), & wanted to say hello & thanks for the friendly welcome. I was upset when I found out MA has
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, all. I just joined MA on Rodcet yesterday (as Snapdragyn), &
wanted to say hello & thanks for the friendly welcome. I was upset
when I found out MA has (apparently) gone defunct on Brell -- I'd
moved there specifically to join after 1st starting on Erollisi (only
got to 3rd or so there). I had 2 chars on Brell, both at 6th, & had
worked up a good storyline to RP for them (twins, estranged from the
family, 1 thought the other was dead -- oh, the drama, the drama).
So, finding out that I had to drop them if I wanted to move to Rodcet
& join MA was NOT pleasant news.

Well, let me say to anyone who's debating the same situation --
IT'S WORTH IT! I've done an EQ marathon this weekend to get Snap (do
prefer that to 'Snappy', BTW) up to 5th, & I've had a lot of fun --
whether just watching & joining the guildchat while bashing waspies,
or grouping with Thundyr (a guildmate I met in G'Fay who's the same
level). I'm already looking forward to starting a rogue on Rodcet &
getting him in the guild, too.

Okay, the basic info:

Name: Todd Morris
Location: San Francisco -- Mecca!
Age: *cough* Almost 30 *cough* (34 -- 'almost' from the other side)
Single
Main chars: Er, not sure now. Were Trylain & Trylorn, the twins --
Wizard of the Sixth Circle/Rogue of the Sixth Shadow on Brell.
Already leaning towards Snapdragyn (Bard of the Fifth Song), but
we'll see.

Er, forgot the rest of the stuff from that intro form (oops), but
there's a little. Look forward to seeing you all ingame!
